overview: Karthik is a plumbing and electrical sub-contractor in Chennai metro. His better half kannama is a house wife. Their only daughter ‘kanmani’. At the age of four she is almost an expertise in drawing.Since Karthik lives in an apartment in Chennai, his dream is to buy a house on their own.In search of it karthik received some property details from a broker. By seeing a particular property from kodaikanal both karthik and kannama got astonished because the house they saw was already a painting,done by kanmani.Kanmani .
title: Kanmani Pappa
